name: Stormpath Laravel Example
description: An endpoint you can use to see how the Laravel Integration works.

STORMPATH_CLIENT_APIKEY_ID.description: The API key ID from your ~/.stormpath/apiKey.properties file

STORMPATH_CLIENT_APIKEY_SECRET.description: The API key secret from your ~/.stormpath/apiKey.properties file

STORMPATH_APPLICATION_HREF.description: The URL for your Stormpath Application from the Stormpath Admin Dashboard
